Title: Requires the office of children and family services and its authorized agencies to provide surveillance cameras
Summary: Requires the office of children and family services and its authorized agencies to provide surveillance cameras.
LawCode: Add ยง380-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring the office of children and family services and authorized agencies of the office of children and family services to provide surveillance cameras
